Watchable, but i'm a hard-core Thor fan. 
There is quite a bit of flicker throughout, not all the time, but still alot. Other than that, pretty good video. No people walking thru, no laughter. Watched it on a 32" screen and was a little blurry around some of the edges.
Audio is very understandable, towards the end I think it may have gotten better.
v6
a5 (little hollow at times)
m= up to you to decide
ps. my wife watched this copy w/me, and said we should go take the kids to see it in the theater.

And thank you for uploading this. My family and I are eternally grateful for your ability and willingness to share.
+1
